data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,056,200 citizens of Tunis, Tunisia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tunis, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,056,200 citizens of the the state of Tunis.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 211 new simple churches in the state of Tunis, Tunisia. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,056,200 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 314 believers in Tunis that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Amazigh, Matmata people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Tunis, Tunisia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Tunis, Tunisia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Tunis, Tunisia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
